db:article.db:para: Single-file public domain (or MIT licensed) libraries for C/C++
Used in tests to demonstrate and verify the integration of an external GUI library.
The sources can be found in qt3d/src/3rdparty/imgui/imstb_rectpack.h, qt3d/src/3rdparty/imgui/imstb_textedit.h, and qt3d/src/3rdparty/imgui/imstb_truetype.h.
